askAway.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Ask away
askAway.description: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Blawby AI can answer legal questions, help you understand legal concepts, review documents, and much more.

privacy.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Don't share sensitive info
privacy.description: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Chat history may be reviewed or used to improve our services. Learn more about your choices in our <helpCenterLink>Help Center</helpCenterLink>.

accuracy.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Check your facts
accuracy.description: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] While we have safeguards, Blawby AI may give you inaccurate information. It's not intended to give legal advice.
